price: 26. Sidaasi waxaa ugu wacan waxay ku yidhaahdeen kuwa nacay12 waxa Alle soo dejiyey oo Waxyi ah: Waxaynu idinku adeeci arrinka qaarkiis (colnimada Nabiga); Allena wuu Og yahay sirahooda.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ
footnotes: 12. Waxaa loola jeedaa Yuhuudddii Madiina degganayd waagaas.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
